headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; connect-src 'self' https://api.safenote.xyz; style-src-elem 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com;
